body.p:
Law Office of
GEO. C. & MONT. GIBBS,
2070 BROADWAY, CORNER OF FULTON ST.
New York June 7 1862
Dear Sir --

In reply to your printed note of May 22, I beg to ask that Geo. C. Gibbs. be appointed Commr in my place & stead. He is my partner, is Commr for nearly every state & his appt. will be in every way creditable to the state --
My frequent absences from New York render it more convenient for us that he hold the Commn.

J. W. Tate Esq.
asst. secy &c &c,
